query:
SELECT u.id, u.email, u.name, r.id as recruiter_id, c.id as candidate_id 
FROM users u 
LEFT JOIN recruiters r ON u.id = r.userId 
LEFT JOIN candidates c ON u.id = c.userId 
WHERE u.email IN ('citilmail@gmail.com', 'blaindr@gmail.com')
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user Qn11raqpZKapJrc.584a41145ea0 --database myxzroeDB4HgZWmTgbS8PA --execute SELECT u.id, u.email, u.name, r.id as recruiter_id, c.id as candidate_id 
FROM users u 
LEFT JOIN recruiters r ON u.id = r.userId 
LEFT JOIN candidates c ON u.id = c.userId 
WHERE u.email IN ('citilmail@gmail.com', 'blaindr@gmail.com')
